title: (x) What is this lovely typeface? / Light italic w/ tiny ball terminals - H&FJ Archer Hairline Italic {Nick M}
content:
I need help identifying this typeface.  
Any help is much appreciated.  
Thank you.

Archer - Hairline Italic
